fi.cs.helsinki.glindstr.soccerdb.dao
Interface MembershipDao

All Superinterfaces:
BaseDao<Membership>
All Known Implementing Classes:
MembershipDaoImpl
public interface MembershipDao
extends BaseDao<Membership>

An interface for database operations on the membership table. The MemebershipDao interface provides a method for gaining a list of all memberships.

Method Summary
 java.util.List<Membership> getAllMemberships()
          Returns a list containing all leagues in the database.
 java.util.List<Team> getTeamsByLeagueAndSeason(int leagueId, int seasonId)
          Returns a list of teams playing in a specified league in a specified season.
